to.shell_command: open -g raycast://confetti

rules.description: Double Tap right shift to opt+backslash
Double Tap left shift to cmd+opt+[

set_notification_message.text:
A | Slack
S | Spotify
X | Xcode
V | Visual Studio Code
C | Google Chrome Canary
F | Firefox Developer Edition
T | Sourcetree
Z | System Settings

to.shell_command: open -a "Slack".app
open -a "Spotify".app
open -a "Xcode".app
open -a "Visual Studio Code".app
open -a "Google Chrome Canary".app
open -a "Firefox Developer Edition".app
open -a "Sourcetree".app
open -a "System Settings".app

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "😂"
tell application "System Events"
  keystroke "v" using command down
  delay 0.1
end tell
set the clipboard to prev'

osascript -e '
set prev to the clipboard
set the clipboard to "❤️"

  keystroke "v" using command down

set_notification_message.text:
g = 'https://github.com'
y = 'https://www.youtube.com'
h = 'https://news.ycombinator.com'
r = 'https://old.reddit.com'
u = 'https://www.ubereats.com'
w = 'https://www.wolt.com'

to.shell_command: open "https://github.com"
open "https://www.youtube.com"
open "https://news.ycombinator.com"
open "https://old.reddit.com"
open "https://www.ubereats.com"
open "https://www.wolt.com"
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Xcode action group"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "VSCode: Go To Definition"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Zed: Go To Definition"'
osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "Chrome action group"'
